modName: Raven Rock House Light and Smoke Elements
summary: 2 Music tracks added, atmospheric effects. More soon!
descriptionHtml:
[size=24][FONT=Impact]Raven Rock House[/FONT][/size]
[size=18][FONT=Impact]Severin Manor[/size][/FONT]

[FONT=Palatino Linotype]
-Realistic Lighting
-Smelter and Forge produce smoke that fills the house
-Fireplace emits smoke for a realistic appearance
-Cleaned with TES5edit courteous of Sharlikran TES5edit can be found in the link provided
  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859]TES5Edit Skyrim Nexus[/url]


Forthcoming additions and changes include: 

-[s]Audio change in house Suggestions for music is needed[/s]
-Suggestions made in the comments are taken note of
-This will be Continuously updated.



-outside of Raven Rock is a small change to environment. Hardly noticable; but for those who find those differences; screenshots would be nice. They\'re very close by. I look forward to more detail in the world in forthcoming updates. 
-------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.1

Added 2 New Tracks inside the Manor
Severin Manor changed to \"Your House\"

**Update I will be updating the lighting to Morrowind lanterns that are more appropriate for Solstheim. Color changes inside. Smoke removal? 
 
[/FONT]



[size=32][color=red][FONT=Palatino Linotype]Requires Version 1.8.151.0.7 Skyrim + DLC Dragonborn[/size][/color][/FONT]
author: EMT2010

files.name: Raven Rock House Light and Smoke
files.fileName: Raven Rock House Light and Smoke-31409-1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Player house default name from Severin Manor to a new default name "Your House"
Default Cave sounds removed from Raven Rock Manor/Player House +2 Tracks added. Audio Levels Ajdusted.
